name: Ayushman Bharat PM-JAY

summaries.en: Provides cashless secondary and tertiary care coverage for eligible low-income families through empaneled hospitals.
summaries.hi: योग्य परिवारों को पैनल अस्पतालों में कैशलेस सेकेंडरी और टर्शियरी इलाज की सुविधा देता है।

next_steps: Check eligibility using ration card/SECC records at nearest CSC or Ayushman Mitra desk.
Carry Aadhaar and family ID documents for e-card generation.
Use the PM-JAY hospital list to locate an empaneled facility nearby.

name: Janani Suraksha Yojana (JSY)

summaries.en: Promotes institutional delivery by providing financial assistance to eligible pregnant women, especially in rural and low-income households.
summaries.hi: यह योजना पात्र गर्भवती महिलाओं को संस्थागत प्रसव के लिए वित्तीय सहायता देती है, खासकर ग्रामीण परिवारों में।

next_steps: Register pregnancy early at sub-center/PHC with ASHA support.
Keep MCP card and bank details ready for benefit transfer.
Confirm district-specific eligibility criteria with ANM/PHC.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)

summaries.en: Provides conditional cash incentives for pregnant and lactating women for improved health-seeking and nutrition practices.
summaries.hi: यह योजना गर्भवती और धात्री महिलाओं को पोषण और स्वास्थ्य सेवाओं के उपयोग के लिए चरणबद्ध नकद सहायता देती है।

next_steps: Register at Anganwadi center or health facility.
Submit required identity, pregnancy, and bank account documents.
Track installment status through local health worker.

name: eSanjeevani Telemedicine

summaries.en: Government telemedicine platform for remote doctor consultation, useful in low-access areas before physical referral.
summaries.hi: सरकारी टेलीमेडिसिन प्लेटफ़ॉर्म जो दूरस्थ क्षेत्रों में डॉक्टर से ऑनलाइन परामर्श की सुविधा देता है।

next_steps: Use smartphone or Common Service Center for registration.
Keep previous prescriptions and test reports ready.
Follow referral advice for in-person care when required.
